channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Females sleep less, awaken more frequently than males
item.description: A new animal study shows that males and females have profoundly different sleep patterns. The findings shed light on what may drive differences in hum...

item.title: A remarkable fossil assemblage gets a new interpretation

item.title: Synchronized movement between robots and humans builds trust, study finds
item.description: Trust between humans and robots is improved when the movement between both is harmonized, researchers have discovered.
